product_name: White Sierra Kalgoorlie Shirt - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: The White Sierra Kalgoorlie shirt is great for active adventures on either the dirt or urban trail when quick drying fabric and sun protection are at the top of your list. Sanded woven nylon fabric resists wind and water and dries quickly, yet maintains breathability and wicks moisture for comfort in warm weather. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Back mesh yoke vent circulates air to keep you dryer and more comfortable. Roll-up sleeves secure with button-tabs. The White Sierra Kalgoorlie shirt features a chest pocket with hidden zipper. Special buy.
short_description: The White Sierra Kalgoorlie shirt is great for active adventures on either the dirt or urban trail when quick drying fabric and sun protection are at the top of your list.
